title: I did a lineage test today.
body:
I have ties to both the British nobility and Austrian nobility.

Unban my account or I'll annex your entire country. Don't push me, I may be merciful, but that will not last.

replies.body:
Wow lmao, better do what he says

Chances are though (Much like me) you're from a bastard child's line, meaning you have no power :^)

> [{quoted}](name=DarkShade918,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gNBkbOOM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-12T01:57:50.224+0000)
>
> Wow lmao, better do what he says
> 
> Chances are though (Much like me) you're from a bastard child's line, meaning you have no power :^)

Not a bastard line, at least nothing that shows. It was an interesting read, honestly. Sadly, despite the rich and exciting history of my family, I literally cannot provide proof because it has my information there and, because I'm the last male alive, you can see all my details, which ruins my arrogant air and I cannot have this. I'm from the direct line, whereas there's branch from where my family literally married everyone all over the world. Hence the connection to Austrian nobility. That, I assume is a bastard line.

My family was also one of the first settlers to Australia. Wowies.

ANNEX THIS COUNTRY, IT'S MINE! WE DISCOVERED IT.
